text: Va Alloh taolo masali [digare] zadaast: du mardro [farz kuned], ki jake az on du lol ast va hec kore az vaj ʙarnameojad va sarʙori dusti xud meʙosad, har kuco uro mefiristad, hec xajre ʙa hamroh nameovarad [va vazoifasro ʙa durusti ancom namedihad]; ojo u ʙo kase, ki ʙa adolat farmon medihad va xud ʙar rohe mustaqim qaror dorad, ʙaroʙar ast? [Pas, sumo musrikon ci guna qodiri mutlaqro ʙo ʙuthoi ʙeehsosi notavon jakson medoned]
